attributes.name: max
attributes.desc: the maximum number of messages that can be displayed at the same time

attributes.name: grouping ^(2.8.2)
attributes.desc: merge messages with the same content, type of VNode message is not supported

attributes.name: duration ^(2.8.2)
attributes.desc: display duration, millisecond. If set to 0, it will not turn off automatically

attributes.name: showClose ^(2.8.2)
attributes.desc: whether to show a close button

attributes.name: offset ^(2.8.2)
attributes.desc: set the distance to the top of viewport
